title: fail precommit on comparingIdentical
description: I learnt about the ecj.javadocs.prefs via LUCENE-7077 earlier today. This ticket proposes to make org.eclipse.jdt.core.compiler.problem.comparingIdentical an error also, this would require replacing one assert in the SingletonSortedSetDocValues constructor with an equivalent test.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit f1ad769666d5ddc090acd3c366ffa5c6af265cd1 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Christine Poerschke
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=f1ad769 ]

LUCENE-7084: fail precommit on comparingIdentical. also replaces one assert in the SingletonSortedSetDocValues constructor with equivalent test (TestSortedSetDocValues.testNoMoreOrdsConstant).

comments.content:

LUCENE-7084: fail precommit on comparingIdentical. also replaces one assert in the SingletonSortedSetDocValues constructor with equivalent test (TestSortedSetDocValues.testNoMoreOrdsConstant).

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Christine Poerschke can this be resolved now?

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: Manually correcting fixVersion per Step #S5 of LUCENE-7271
